ol.li: Open the engine compartment lid fully.

cap-multistate.name: hood
cap-multistate.text: check the state of the hood
cap-multistate.state: Oh my! Tell us what's wrong

step.info: Check if the second hand is moving faster than the minute hand and the minute hand faster than the hour hand.
Lift the engine out of the compartment lid for maintenance purposes.

ol.li: Reassemble the engine and place the engine back into the compartment Lid.
Lower lid and let ot fall into the lock.
Check that the lid has engaged correctly in the lock and that the release lever is back in its initial position.
